# Scissors vs Paper. Lose. 2
# Draw against Scissors. Scissors. 3 + 3 = 6

# Draw against Scissors. Scissors. 3 + 3 = 6
C Y
# Paper vs Rock. Lose. 1
# Lose against Paper. Rock. 1
B X

# Draw against Paper. Paper. 2 + 3 = 5

# Scissors vs Scissors. Draw. 3 + 3 = 6
# Win against Scissors. Rock. 1 + 6 = 7
C Z

# Win against Scissors. Rock. 1 + 6 = 7
C Z
# Scissors vs Paper. Lose. 2 + 0 = 2
# Draw against Scissors. Scissors. 3 + 3 = 6
C Y
